title: Identifying Opportunities for Climate-Compatible Tourism Development in Belize
author: Gregg Verutes
desc: This web viewer enables users to summarize InVEST outputs without the need for a GIS.

title: Belize Synthesis
author: Arkema et al. 2015
desc: Biophysical and economic values for three ecosystem services and the area of habitat capable of providing services.

title: Overlap Analysis
author: Kim et al. 2012
desc: Overlap between areas of positive annual net present value over 25 years of wave energy conversion and 5 categories of existing uses or ecological characteristics.

title: Wave Energy Net Present Value
author: Kim et al. 2012
desc: Wave energy net present value in million USD over a 25-year life-span of wave energy conversion facilities and wave energy areas of interest  from the BC Marine Atlas.

title: Belize Habitat Risk Assessment
author: Arkema et al. 2014
desc: Corals, mangroves and seagrasses classified as high, medium and low risk from current human activity in Belize.

title: Coastal Habitats Shield People and Property from Sea-Level Rise and Storms
author: Arkema et al. 2013
desc: Exposure of the US coastline and coastal population to sea-level rise in 2100 and storms.

title: Human Uses and Support Services in Lemmens Inlet, BC Canada
author: Guerry et al. 2012
desc: Three alternative management scenarios for Lemmens Inlet, BC identified by West Coast Aquatic and some InVEST outputs.

title: Coastal Habitats Defend U.S. Communities
author: Gregg Verutes
desc: This web viewer enables users to explore results from Arkema et al. 2013 without the need for a GIS.

title: Ocean Zoning
